comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I'm going w/ 12:15 for my departure time. If SB's start time is too early, come ride w/ me. Buzz me: 2-2672 DU

comments.author: Greg
comments.body: Anybody interested in going to the Warren Miller flick on Sunday afternoon? (http://www.skinet.com/warrenmiller/) It's a great way to get psyched for the winter and there are some great giveaways too. Let me know.
